thread.title: Super Bowl 2017 halftime show with Lady Gaga, more performers
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 2017 halftime show with Lady Gaga, more performers | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Super Bowl 2017 halftime show with Lady Gaga, more performers
text:
Lady Gaga’s halftime show, Luke Bryan’s National Anthem and more: See photos of the Super Bowl LI performers during the game between the New England Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas on Sunday, Feb. 5. (Credit: Getty Images / Elsa) HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Lady Gaga performs during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images)
(Credit: Getty Images / Gregory Shamus) HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Lady Gaga performs during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Gregory Shamus/Getty Images)
(Credit: Getty Images / Ezra Shaw) HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Lady Gaga performs during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images)
ADVERTISEMENT
ADVERTISE HERE (Credit: Getty Images / Gregory Shamus) HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Lady Gaga performs during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Gregory Shamus/Getty Images)
(Credit: Getty Images / Elsa) HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Lady Gaga performs during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images)
(Credit: Getty Images / Ezra Shaw) HOUSTON, TX - FEBRUARY 05: Lady Gaga performs during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images)
Luke Bryan (Credit: AP / Charlie Riedel) Country music artist Luke Bryan sings the national anthem before the NFL Super Bowl 51 football game between the Atlanta Falcons and the New England Patriots at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas on Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017.
'Hamilton' cast members (Credit: AP / Matt Slocum) "Hamilton" cast members, from left, Jasmine Cephas Jones, Rene Elise Goldsberry and Phillipa Soo sing "America the Beautiful," before the NFL Super Bowl LI game between the New England Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas on Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017.
ADVERTISEMENT
ADVERTISE HERE Luke Bryan (Credit: Getty Images / Larry Busacca) Luke Bryan, left, and New York Giants' Eli Manning attend Super Bowl LI at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas on Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017.
Luke Bryan (Credit: Getty Images / Larry Busacca) Luke Bryan attends the Super Bowl LI Pregame at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas on Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017.
